03:06.0 Network controller [0280]: Broadcom Corporation BCM4318 [AirForce 54g] 802.11a/b/g PCI Express Transceiver [14e4:4319] (rev 02)
        Subsystem: Dell Wireless 1470 Dual Band WLAN Mini-PCI Card [1028:0005]
        Flags: bus master, fast devsel, latency 64, IRQ 22
        Memory at f9bfe000 (32-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=8K]
        Kernel driver in use: b43-pci-bridge
        Kernel modules: ssb
